page.title: 19Housing
page.content: The area has a varied housing stock.In the{Hirael}area of Bangor many of the houses date back to the heyday of{Port {Penrhyn}and the{Penrhyn Slate Quarries They are small two bedroomed terraced houses.Some have been demolished to make way for 1930's type semi-detached houses. In the{Garth}area again terraced houses predominate although there are many large detached buildings also.To the north east is a large council estate - Maesgeirchen with some 4000 inhabitants and its own school. On the south westerly side of our area are large detached private homes most with large gardens although adjacent to our school are several streets of small terraced houses. The{Anglesey}area of thr block has several small estates of privately owned two or three bedroomed bungalows
